name: A Hard Platformer
description:
Comment how many deaths you had before you first got to the end!

A precision platformer demo/prototype with a single map. Learn the controls, master the mechanics and get to the end in one full run to win bragging rights.

Share with your friends if you wanna be nice :)

~

Made  by -

Manibharathi Periasamymanjula (https://github.com/GameDeva)
